DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Coconut Oil Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , cross study determine efficacy coconut oil ( proprietary blend coconut medium chain triglyceride oil , administer orally three time daily ) subject Alzheimer 's disease screen ApoE 4 allele . The study medication formula Cognate Nutritionals Fuel Thought™ . Approximately 65 subject treat coconut oil beverage ( Fuel Thought™ ) placebo three month , give 3-5 day interim wash period . After , subject resume three month treatment opposite treatment arm . Total treatment period 6 month .
